article:
The 'NASA Acquisition Internet Service' (NAIS) is a service provided by the NASA
in order to disseminate information about NASA procurements. NAIS has been hailed by the GAO as "an effective mechanism for
disseminating procurement information to industry, including small businesses."-
[http://oai.dtic.mil/oai/oai?verb=getRecord&metadataPrefix=html&identifier-
=ADA359866 Acquisition Reform: NASA's Internet Service Improves Access to
Contracting Information.]
categories: Government procurement in the United States
Government databases in the United States
